title: Move sync-after-claim rule to PRIME.md and clean up AGENTS.md
description: Add the sync-after-claim rule to .beads/PRIME.md instead of AGENTS.md. Clean up AGENTS.md to remove duplication with PRIME.md, keeping only project-specific details.

title: Set up project folder structure and basic HTML/CSS
description: Create organized folder structure (src/components, src/engine, src/utils). Set up index.html, main.tsx, and basic global CSS.

title: Implement Fire button and turn management system
description: Create Fire button that triggers shot. Implement turn switching logic. Disable controls during shot animation. Handle turn indicators (whose turn it is).

title: Add Start button with transition from loading screen
description: Create prominent Start button component. Implement fade-in after loading animations complete. Wire up click handler to initialize game.

title: Design impressive cannon with detailed barrel
description: Upgrade tank cannon to look more impressive. Add barrel thickness variation, muzzle brake at the end, metallic sheen, and possibly a slight glow or heat effect. Make the cannon feel powerful and dangerous.

title: Initialize Node.js/React/TypeScript project with build tooling
description: Set up new project with package.json, install React, TypeScript, and build tools (Vite recommended). Configure TypeScript compiler options.

title: Add visual polish with shadows and ground effects
description: Add drop shadow beneath tanks for grounding effect. Include subtle dust/dirt effects around tracks. Add ambient occlusion where tank meets terrain to integrate tanks into the scene.

title: Double projectile animation speed without changing physics
Add tank track details with individual segments
description: Replace simple wheel rendering with detailed tank tracks. Show individual track segments/links, road wheels, and drive sprockets. Add subtle animation or texture to make tracks look mechanical.

title: Implement physics engine for projectile trajectory
description: Create physics calculations for projectile motion. Use gravity constant (10 m/s²). Calculate trajectory based on angle, power, and time. Return position coordinates over time.

title: Add terrain size selection (small/medium/large/huge)
description: Add UI to select terrain size before game starts. Options: small, medium, large, huge. Each size affects canvas dimensions and terrain generation scale. Must coordinate with power scaling (tanks-7fv) to ensure projectiles behave correctly across all sizes.

title: Implement loading screen with animations
description: Create delightful loading animations (CSS/canvas animations). Auto-play for a few seconds. Smooth transition effect when complete.

title: Implement terrain generation algorithm
description: Create algorithm to generate random terrain landscape. Use procedural generation (e.g., midpoint displacement or Perlin noise). Return array of height values across screen width.

title: Fix cannon angle exceeding 120 degrees causing glitches
description: Cannon angles above 120 degrees cause game glitches. Need to constrain angle to max 120 degrees everywhere including initial tank placement.

title: Implement AI-controlled enemy tanks
description: Enemy tanks are controlled by AI that automatically selects angle, power, and fires. AI calculates trajectory toward player tank. Includes difficulty settings that affect accuracy: 'Blind Fool' (wildly inaccurate), 'Private' (poor), 'Veteran' (decent), 'Centurion' (good), 'Emperor' (deadly accurate). Higher difficulties add less random error to calculations.

title: Adjust loading screen animation timing and spacing
description: Add 40px more space between title and start button. Start animation immediately with 'The new'. Each word lasts 3 seconds longer (7s total). Particles move 20% faster.

title: Combine angle and power controls into single centered panel
Fix cannon rendering to appear behind turret dome
Calibrate physics to screen size and add power scaling
description: Tune physics constants so full power at 70° goes left-to-right across screen. Scale based on canvas dimensions. Test and adjust initial velocity calculations.

title: Fix projectile spawn position to center of cannon
Delay turn end until explosion completes and increase projectile speed 33%
Set projectile animation speed to 3x
Add rule: all changes must be tied to a bead
description: Update AGENTS.md and README.md to enforce that every change must be linked to a beads issue. This ensures traceability and proper workflow adherence.

title: Fix AI continuously recalculating angle/power instead of settling
description: AI keeps changing angle and power values instead of selecting final values and firing. Likely being called repeatedly in render loop.

title: Adjust power scaling for different terrain sizes
description: Calibrate projectile physics so that power feels consistent across all terrain sizes. Full power at optimal angle should traverse approximately the same relative distance regardless of terrain size. May need to scale velocity, gravity, or introduce terrain-size multiplier.

title: Add sync-after-claim rule to workflow
description: Add rule requiring bd sync immediately after claiming a task to prevent multiple agents from taking the same task.

title: Set up Canvas rendering infrastructure
description: Create Canvas component wrapper in React. Set up rendering context and frame loop. Handle window resizing and canvas scaling.

title: Create custom .beads/PRIME.md with branching workflow
description: Override default bd prime output with our custom workflow. Include branching requirements, feature branch workflow, quality gates, and session close protocol. This will be automatically shown to all agents at session start via Claude Code hooks.

title: Build angle selection UI with keyboard shortcuts
description: Create UI control for selecting cannon angle (0-90 degrees). Add keyboard shortcuts (arrow keys/number keys). Display current angle visually on tank.

title: Set up game state management system
description: Implement state management (React Context/Zustand/Redux). Track game phase (loading/playing/gameover), current turn, tank states, terrain data.

title: Build power selection UI with keyboard shortcuts
description: Create UI control for selecting shot power (0-100%). Add keyboard shortcuts. Display power meter/bar. Clean, intuitive design.

title: Implement projectile-tank hit detection
description: Detect when explosion radius overlaps with tank position. Check if any part of explosion touches tank hitbox. Return boolean hit result.

title: Fix projectile firing to use new angle system
description: Projectile firing logic still uses old angle system (0=right, 90=up) but UI now stores angles as (0=up, positive=left, negative=right). Need to convert angle when firing: physicsAngle = 90 + uiAngle.

title: Adjust loading animation timing and text
Fix angle range to allow aiming in both directions (-120 to 120)
description: Tanks on the right side cannot aim left because angle is capped at 0-90 degrees. Change angle system so 0 degrees points straight up, with range from -120 (aiming right/down) to +120 (aiming left/down). This allows tanks on either side to aim at each other and shoot slightly downward at lower targets.

title: Create tank color selection screen
description: Add new game phase 'color_select' between loading and playing. Create UI screen where player chooses their tank color from available options (e.g., red, blue, green, yellow). Store selected color in game state. Transition to game initialization after selection.

title: Place tanks on terrain surface after color selection
description: After players select their tank colors and the game transitions to the battle screen, tanks are placed at seemingly random vertical positions that have no relation to the terrain height. Tanks should be placed on top of the terrain surface at their assigned horizontal positions, with their bottom touching the terrain.

title: Fix cannon to originate from turret dome instead of body
description: The cannon barrel is currently drawn from the center of the tank body. It should originate from the turret dome on top of the tank. Need to adjust the barrel drawing position to start from the dome center.

title: Add metallic shading and gradients to tank body
description: Replace flat color tank body with metallic appearance using gradients, highlights, and shadows. Add depth with darker bottom edges and lighter top surfaces to simulate 3D metal look.

title: Setup the basic project structure as simple single page application
description: Create a single page web application remake of Scorched Earth tank game using Node.js, React, and TypeScript. Features: loading animations, random terrain generation, turn-based gameplay with angle/power selection, physics-based projectile motion, collision detection, and win conditions.

title: Implement projectile-terrain collision detection
description: Detect when projectile intersects with terrain. Check projectile position against terrain height array. Return collision point coordinates.

title: Add tank turret dome with rotating hatch
description: Add a dome/cupola on top of the tank body to house the turret. Include a commander's hatch detail. Make the turret base look like it can rotate, connecting visually to the cannon.

title: Create Tank entity with rendering and positioning
description: Define Tank class/type with position, color, health. Implement tank rendering on canvas. Add logic to place tanks on terrain at left/right positions.

title: Fix bd sync --import-only command in PRIME.md workflow
Add enemy tank count selection
description: Add UI to select number of enemy tanks (1-5 or similar range). Enemies should be distributed across the terrain at reasonable spacing. Game state needs to track multiple enemy tanks and handle turn order.

title: AI tank not firing
Fix AI not firing and round angle/power to integers
description: AI tank is not firing projectile. Also need to round angle and power to integers (no decimals).

title: Clarify workflow rules and preserve remote branches
description: Update AGENTS.md and README.md to make workflow rules unmissable. Change workflow to NOT delete remote branches after merging - keep them for history/reference.

title: Implement game initialization sequence
description: After color selection, execute game start sequence: 1) Generate random terrain using existing algorithm, 2) Create player tank with selected color at left position, 3) Create opponent tank with contrasting color at right position, 4) Initialize turn state (player goes first), 5) Transition to 'playing' phase. Wire up the complete flow from color selection to gameplay.

title: Change active tank highlight to yellow arrow pointing up
description: Replace glowing outline with a small glowing yellow arrow pointing up at the tank from below

title: Implement win condition and game over state
description: Display winner when tank is destroyed. Show game over screen with winner announcement. Add restart/play again button. Transition back to start state.

title: Add clickable AI difficulty selection with rank chevrons
description: Allow clicking on enemy tank to cycle AI difficulty (Blind Fool → Private → Veteran → Centurion → Primus → back to Blind Fool). Rename Emperor to Primus. Display rank as chevrons on tank body.

title: Create explosion animation effect
description: Implement small explosion animation at impact point. Use particles/canvas animation/sprite. Play on collision. Clean up after animation completes.

title: Change projectile animation speed to 1.5x
Highlight active tank during turn
Fix particle animation timing and spawn distance
description: Particles spawn too far away and move too slowly for the 7s word duration. Reduce spawn distance and increase speed so animation completes within each word cycle.

title: Implement projectile animation with dotted trace line
description: Animate projectile along calculated trajectory. Draw dotted line showing projectile path. Smooth frame-by-frame animation. Start from tank cannon position.

title: Decrease POWER_SCALE by 25%
description: Current POWER_SCALE of 1.49 is too fast. Decrease by 25% to 1.12.
